mapper.select: SELECT id, region, title, zip_code, addr, tel, info, pic1_org, pic1_uuid, pic2_org, pic2_uuid, pic3_org, pic3_uuid FROM room_mst
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO room_mst ( id, title, zip_code, addr, tel, info, region, type_of_acco, pic1_org, pic1_uuid, pic2_org, pic2_uuid, pic3_org, pic3_uuid, c_user ) VALUES ( seq_room_mst.nextval, #{title}, #{zipCode}, #{addr}, #{tel}, #{info}, #{region},#{typeOfAcco}, #{pic1Org}, #{pic1Uuid}, #{pic2Org}, #{pic2Uuid}, #{pic3Org}, #{pic3Uuid}, #{cUser} )
SELECT seq_room_mst.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE room_mst SET title = #{title}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, addr = #{addr}, tel = #{tel}, info = #{info}, pic1_org = #{pic1Org}, pic1_uuid = #{pic1Uuid}, pic2_org = #{pic2Org}, pic2_uuid = #{pic2Uuid}, pic3_org = #{pic3Org}, pic3_uuid = #{pic3Uuid} WHERE id=#{id}
